sourcesContent:
<template>
    <swiper
        :slides-per-view="3"
        style="width: 1200px !important;margin-top: 3vh !important;"
        :loop="false"
        navigation
        :pagination="{ clickable: true }"
        :scrollbar="{ draggable: true }"
        @swiper="onSwiper"
        @slideChange="onSlideChange"
        class="swiper swiper-initialized swiper-horizontal swiper-css-mode"
    >
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Heavy metal" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Nu metal" file-name="mick_thompson_guitar.png" color="white"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Metalcore" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Rapcore" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Groove Metal" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
      <swiper-slide><slide title="Orchestral metal" file-name="dimebag_guitar_pc.png" color="blue"/></swiper-slide>
    </swiper>
</template>

<script>
import Slide from "./Slide.vue";
import Lazy from "../lazy/Lazy.vue";
import {Swiper, SwiperSlide} from "swiper-vue2";
import 'swiper/swiper-bundle.css';
import SwiperCore, { Navigation, Pagination, Mousewheel, Keyboard } from 'swiper';
SwiperCore.use([Navigation, Pagination, Mousewheel, Keyboard]);

export default {
  name: "TheSlideGroup",
  components: {
    Slide,
    Lazy,
    Swiper,
    SwiperSlide
  },
  data: () => ({
    model: null
  }),
  methods: {
    onSwiper (swiper) {
      console.log(swiper)
    },
    onSlideChange () {
      console.log('slide change')
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
